reviews.review: Es adrenalinico y esta siempre con ese momento de tencion donde puedes morir o sobrevivir, ademas que en mi tiempo de juego la cooperacion a sido bastante buena y la gente no es toxica.

Playing with friends makes this game 110% more enjoyable. The gameplay is smooth and makes me coom. I didn't have the game before the graphical overhaul so I can't speak for then, but you can definitely tell where it did update the look of the game. Only complaint is that the game is VERY I MEAN VERRRRY loaded with microtransactions but that is why I would get it on sale like I did. The game is fun though and does have a learning curve to a degree. 10.10 would buy on sale, again.
i played this game with my gf, it was a very good time. saving her off the hook saved our relationship! pogchamp!

One of the only games I can play recently that I actually have fun in. This game is super good and perfect for the price. It's fun for casual play, and in higher ranks can be competetive. The playermodels are amazing, the characters and killers have a lot of variety. The killers in this game look actually so insanely cool and scary its amazing.
A good chill game to have a few drinks and unwind to.

I found out that the error that claims steam is offline is caused by the old ui. Once i removed the old ui i was able to play the game and had a great deal of fun with it. Every loss made me want to play again to win. And every win made me want another. The one thing that makes me angry however is Ghostface. He is designed to basically sit there and watch you die.
As he can effectively erase his existence. Still Spine chill can help a lot against him. Also is it just me or do Ghostface players love to tea bag?

Muy buen juego, tanto como para divertirte jugando solo como con amigos. 
Es mucho mejor jugar con amigos, asi se distribuyen bien las tareas dentro del juego y asi no se pierde tiempo en reparar, ir a rescatar, etc. 
El juego creo que deberia nerfear o buffear algunas perks, mi unica queja seria que los survivors realizamos muchas tareas y no recibimos muchos puntos de sangre a comparacion con el killer, que aun que pierda la partida sale ganando muchos puntos de sangre.

The Executioner is terrifying. The Huntress is trash. The Clown is OP asf in higher ranks. The Nurse is trash. Freddy is alright. Leatherface is good if you use him correctly. The other killers are pretty repetitive with some abilities, but are unique in their own ways and are pretty fun. Make sure you use the shrine of secrets when you see a good perk, its useful af. Fun game. 8/10
